title: Bronze: Leave Baron ALONE!
body:
Im losing so many games due to the team thinking baron is a good idea when every enemy team member is up and baron is warded so they not doing it.. its like they walk past mid and smell baron and go.. OMG we gotta do it

Then BAM throw and loss!


AGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!
Bronze, Seriously

replies.body:
Hey,
It can be a bad decision to take Baron while all 5 membets are up. However, if you keep control of wards on Baron by pink warding or sweeping, and are warding so you have vision on the enemy team, Baron may be a great call. Depending on who your top lane is, you can send them bot to distract the enemy team while you secure Baron. Baron is a very strong objective and gives you heaps of pressure. Make it very clear to your team mates if you don't think Baron is a good idea, but bare in mind sometimes it may be the right thing to do.

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn

Only times ever to get baron. 

After an Ace.

If you have two or 1 inhib with them with one person dead or at least their jungler dead. 

Heavy lane pressure and wards around baron and deep into their jungle.

Or you have an insane amount of damage and think you have a good enough window to 15 second baron kill.
